message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_APPLICATION_OWNER
message.locale: Role of application owner for Application %1s of type %2c for %3s has been closed.

message.name: INF_UNASSIGNED_AS_APPLICATION_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: Your role as application owner for application %1s has been closed by %2s. The new application owner is %3s.

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_APPLICATION_OWNER
message.locale: Assigned role of application owner for Application %1s of type %2c for %3s.

message.name: INF_ASSIGNED_AS_APPLICATION_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: You have been assigned the role of application owner for Application %1s by %2s.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPLICATION_REASSIGN_OWNER_TYPE
message.locale: The new owner type must be specified

message.name: ERR_NEW_APPLICATION_OWNER_EQUAL_OLD_APPLCIATION_OWNER
message.locale: New application owner must not be the same as the previous application owner.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATIONROLE_XRV_OWNER_USER_IS_CLOSED
message.locale: The user is closed and cannot be assigned as the application owner.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATIONROLE_XRV_OWNER_ORGUNIT_IS_CLOSED
message.locale: The organization unit is closed and cannot be assigned as the application owner.
The organisation unit is closed and cannot be assigned as the application owner.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATIONROLE_XRV_OWNER_POSITION_IS_CANCELLED
message.locale: The position is canceled and cannot be assigned as owner.
The position is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATIONROLE_XRV_OWNER_USER_IS_CANCELLED
message.locale: The user is canceled and cannot be assigned as owner..
The user is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATIONROLE_XRV_OWNER_ORGUNIT_IS_CANCELLED
message.locale: The organization unit is canceled and cannot be assigned as owner.
The organisation unit is cancelled and cannot be assigned as owner.

message.name: ERR_XRV_USER_NOT_ASSIGNED_POSITION
message.locale: The User must be assigned to a position.
